channel.title: Data science on mitchhenderson.org
channel.description: Recent content in Data science on mitchhenderson.org

item.title: How sports scientists can use ggplot2 in R to make better visualisations
item.description: Great visualisations help communicate your message more clearly. This post shows you an example of my process.

item.title: How to tidy Catapult 10Hz export data
item.description: The export format of Catapult’s 10Hz GPS data isn’t ideal for analysis. This article teaches you how you can tidy it using R.
